title: New Updates to Carolingian UI!
content:
Starting from version 1.13.4, the module includes folders and search in Scene Navigation. After gathering feedback, I've made some modifications to the folders:

  • Added folder tree to the navigation. This way, you can go back and forth between subfolders without reopening the folder list.
  • Some users did not understand that 'Favorites' was Foundry's default navigation. I changed the naming and removed the star icon to avoid confusion.
  • Retained folder list open/closed state in a same session (resets on reload)

Check details and send requests on Github repo or Discord
